subNodes.conversationText: root

This looks like the one.  It was a pity we couldn't have taken the body to Berdusk, so that he could at least rest near my parents' graves.  To think that he lies in an unmarked grave so far from home--it makes me sad.||***ga_jump_players-->String::manfredgrave_wp    Int::1    Int::0    ***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::Q_MANFRED    String::<45    ||
I understand. You know, we could probably raise enough money to transport it.|***ga_global_int-->String::sympathetic String::++ |
No, not now. Some day--When I have retired from fortune-hunting and vagrancy, perhaps, and returned to Berdusk myself.
For now, though, he can stay here. [Looking around.] I've seen worse crypts, really. And I suppose there's treasure to be had in some of the other graves.
[Jesting.] I am glad that your heart can accomodate both grief and greed.|***ga_local_int-->String::ironic String::++ String:: |
I am not sure whether to admire or to condemn you, Vroman.  Not everyone can recover from loss so easily.|***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False    String::ianth    |
Sometimes, Milady, I say more than I mean--and sometimes, I say less than I feel.
In any case--

What was that?!|***ga_create_obj-->String::C    String::zombie_idiot1    String::zswb_wp1    Int::0    String::    Float::0    ***ga_create_obj-->String::C    String::zombie_idiot2    String::zswb_wp2    Int::0    String::    Float::0    ***ga_create_obj-->String::C    String::zombie_idiot3    String::zswb_wp3    Int::0    String::    Float::0    ***ga_create_obj-->String::C    String::zombie_idiot4    String::zswb_wp4    Int::0    String::    Float::0    ***ga_create_obj-->String::C    String::zombie_idiot5    String::zswb_wp5    Int::0    String::    Float::0    |

I just heard something.|***ga_create_obj-->String::C String::zombie_idiot1 String::zswb_wp1 Int::0 String:: Float::0 ***ga_create_obj-->String::C String::zombie_idiot2 String::zswb_wp2 Int::0 String:: Float::0 ***ga_create_obj-->String::C String::zombie_idiot3 String::zswb_wp3 Int::0 String:: Float::0 ***ga_create_obj-->String::C String::zombie_idiot4 String::zswb_wp4 Int::0 String:: Float::0 ***ga_create_obj-->String::C String::zombie_idiot5 String::zswb_wp5 Int::0 String:: Float::0 |

[Peering around the corner into the crypt antechamber, you see that five zombies have appeared!] Where in the Nine Hells did they come from?|***ga_journal-->String::Q_CRYPT Int::5 Int::0 Int::0 Int::0 ***ga_jump_players-->String::zombiesod_dest Int::0 Int::0 |
<color=green> [Spot] I do not know, but it wasn't from any of these coffins.  They appear undisturbed.</color>|***gc_skill_dc-->NOT::False    Int::23    Int::15    |
Quite perceptive.  I noticed the same thing.||***ga_give_xp-->Int::100    Int::0    ***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False    String::gossam    ||
An interesting observation.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::100    Int::0    |
Not from the Nine Hells, I hope.

<color=green> [Spellcraft] I can tell that they were recently summoned.  There is still an aura of necromancy here--those creatures are not native to this crypt.</color>||***ga_global_int-->String::detect_necro    String::1    ***gc_skill_dc-->NOT::False    Int::22    Int::15    ||
It's hard to say.
This is truly strange.  I have been in Drawn Swords for a year, and we have had no trouble with undead--from this crypt or elsewhere.|***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False    String::ianth    |
After we're done here, I am sure Brother Anselm would like to know about this.|***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False    String::gossam    |
Let us not rush. These should be easy work for the power of my goddess.|***gc_comp_remove-->NOT::False String::gossam |
After we're done here, I am sure Brother Anselm would like to know about this.

[Nod and ready your weapon.] |***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot1 String::$HOSTILE ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot2 String::$HOSTILE ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot3 String::$HOSTILE ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot4 String::$HOSTILE ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot5 String::$HOSTILE ***ga_destroy-->String::zombiemashtrig Int::0 Float::0 |

Indeed.  At them!|***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot1    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot2    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot3    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot4    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zombie_idiot5    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_destroy-->String::zombiemashtrig    Int::0    Float::0    |
As incorrigible as ever.
[Nod.] Perhaps so.
The body is not what matters in the end, Vroman.  Justice would please Manfred's spirit more.|***ga_global_int-->String::moral    String::++    |
I doubt Vroman would have wanted vengeance. Things of this world seemed to mean little to him; we were very different. He would prefer a humble tomb in Berdusk to even one of his killers slain.
It is a shame, Vroman, but there is little we can do about it.
This is the grave of Manfred Horner.|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False String::Q_MANFRED String::<45 |
This is the grave of Nevin, the Harper illusionist who fooled everyone into believing he was Manfred.|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False String::Q_MANFRED String::>40 |
